ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Attack speedups
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sure the above mentioned group could feign level me up to 18 in no time! ;-) Good point though. Kit ... From: kim@stormhaven.org
ygData.messageBody:
I'm sure the above mentioned group could feign level me up to 18 in no time!
;-)
Good point though.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 3:40 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Attack speedups


From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 29 Mar 2000, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> they leave on dead mobs. Come to think of it, anyone need a lvl 16
> enchanter on Sol Ro? Available for useless grouping with guys who can
> resurrect her and provide her with handouts for out-buffing their 49th
level
> bard.

Careful. The speedup of Quickness at L16 is only 20%
(according to my timings when I first got the spell, and the
info at castersrealm). At L18 the speedup I timed was 30%.
Minor nit, but try to be accurate about these things.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
